overview: The mentorship by an adult is a formidable period for any coming-of-age teenager. After catapulting her way into a rare opportunity, Ashley Fouch is determined to blaze a new path as she’s hired to become the only woman in the state of Indiana, and one of very few in the United States, to head coach the Daleville High School Boys Varsity Basketball Team. MARE AMONG SONS is an intimate, vérité documentary short that illuminates the relationship between boyhood and valiant women leadership.
title: Mare Among Sons
